semantic_identifier: 76: feat: Add CRM-embedded Guidance panel shell with record context + auth handoff for Account/Opportunity pages

sections.text:
## Description

Implements the initial in-CRM Guidance embedded surface per GOLD-72 for Salesforce/HubSpot Account and Opportunity record views.

Key changes:
- Adds a GuidancePanelShell that mounts inside the CRM record page (no redirect to Sales_Accelerator) and provides the base container UI.
- Wires record context detection/propagation (CRM provider, object type: Account|Opportunity, and recordId) into the panel runtime.
- Implements auth/session handoff for embedded usage (reuses existing session when available; falls back to an embedded handshake flow) and guards all API calls behind an authenticated session.
- Adds container states and UX scaffolding:
  - Loading state while establishing session + resolving context
  - Empty state when no guidance is available (placeholder for future blocks)
  - Error state with retry and minimal diagnostics
- Introduces a small client-side context contract (typed interface) used by downstream guidance block rendering tickets.

Notes for reviewers/users:
- This PR intentionally stops at the embedded container + context/auth wiring; guidance content blocks and copy/action behaviors are not included.
- Validate by opening an Account or Opportunity record in Salesforce/HubSpot with the embedded app installed: the Guidance panel should render, show loading briefly, then empty (or error if auth/context is missing).

## How Has This Been Tested?
